Uses of Class BBjPlugin

    • Methods which return types are uses of the Class 
      Modifier and Type Origin and Description
      public BBjPlugin PluginManager.getInstalledPlugin(String pluginName!)
      public BBjPlugin PluginManager.getRemotePlugin(String pluginName!)

      Returns a list with the available RemoteBBjPlugin objects
    • Methods which parameter types contain uses of the Class 
      Modifier and Type Origin and Description
      public ArrayList PluginManager.getDependentPlugins(InstalledBBjPlugin bbjPlugin!)
      public void PluginManager.installPlugin(RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!, Tag tag!)

      Installes the BBjPlugin with the given name
      public Boolean PluginManager.isDependency(InstalledBBjPlugin bbjPlugin!)
      public Boolean PluginManager.isRemotePluginInstalled(RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!, Tag tag!)

      Returns true if the given remote plugin with the given tag is installed, false otherwise.
      public void PluginManager.removeCustomPluginRepository(RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!)
      public void PluginManager.runConfigurationProgram(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!, String configProgramName!)

      Runs the given plugin's configuration program with the given name.
      public void PluginManager.runDemo(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!, String demoProgramName!)

      Executes the Demo.bbj file in the given plugin's Demo folder.
      public void PluginManager.setUpdateAvailableFlag(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!, Tag tag!, RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!)

      Checks if the given InstalledBBPlugin's version(=Tag) can be updated or not.

      If the given Tag is the master tag, the timestamp of the last change and the timestamp of the installation will be compared. For all other tags, the tag name will be compared.
      public void PluginManager.uninstallPlugin(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)

      Uninstalls the BBj plugin with the given name.
      public void PluginManager.updatePlugin(InstalledBBjPlugin plugin!)
      public void PluginManagerUI.installPlugin(RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!, Tag tag!)
      public Boolean BBjPlugin.equals(BBjPlugin bbjPlugin!)
      public InstalledBBjPlugin InstallationService.installPlugin(RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!, Tag tag!)
      public InstalledBBjPlugin InstallationService.installPlugin(RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!, Tag tag!, String username!, String password!)
      public void InstallationService.uninstallPlugin(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)
      public void InstalledPluginFolderParser.setHasConfigurationProgram(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)

      Parses the given installed plugin's home directory for a plugin configuration program located in a cfg/ folder. If the plugin has such a program its "hasConfigurationProgram" will be set to true.
      public void InstalledPluginFolderParser.setHasDemo(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)
      public void InstalledPluginTab.updateConfigureButtonState(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)

      Uses the information of the given installed bbj plugin to enable or disable the "Run Configuration Program" button. If the gievn installed plugin has a configuration program located in its home/cfg/ folder the button will be enabled, otherwise it will be disabled.
